ecom-yaxa2-product.text0_isehawyeot_html: When you buy one Hemoton Bike, get one free Hemoton Helmet $19,95 !
ecom-yaxa2-product.headingtext_p5um6raifxg_html: Infused with over 30 years of experience and pedigree, the Switchback Sport is a well-rounded
ecom-yaxa2-product.ecomiconlisttitle0_ecom31v12afs6vh_31v12: Lightweight Tectonic T1 aluminum frame with internal cable routing and replaceable dropout hanger
ecom-yaxa2-product.ecomiconlisttitle1_ecom31v12afs6vh_31v12: Shimano Tourney 2 x 8 drivetrain with 3-piece Prowheel aluminum cranks.
ecom-yaxa2-product.ecomiconlisttitle2_ecom31v12afs6vh_31v12: Xposure 80 mm travel fork with steel steerer lockout.
ecom-yaxa2-product.ecomiconlisttitle3_ecom31v12afs6vh_31v12: 27.5" x 2.1" Xposure tires on aluminum double wall rims with mechanical disc brakes.
ecom-yaxa2-product.text0_z78pa817mh9_html: Describir una caracteristica de esta forma de comprar
ecom-yaxa2-product.text1_z78pa817mh9_html: Describir una caracteristica sobre los productos en cuestión
ecom-yaxa2-product.text2_z78pa817mh9_html: Describir una caracteristica de los envíos
ecom-yaxa2-product.text3_z78pa817mh9_html: Describir una caracteristica de esta forma de ver productos
ecom-yaxa2-product.textCard0_ycdifaa9x7d_html:
Mountain bikes require strong and reliable brakes to ensure safety on often challenging terrain. Disc brake system used for vehicle

They provide strong stopping power and are less affected by wet weather and muddy conditions.
ecom-yaxa2-product.textCard1_ycdifaa9x7d_html:
Fork shock absorbers are a critical component of a mountain bike's suspension system, helping to absorb impacts and vibrations from rough terrain.

Adjustable damping allows you to fine-tune the suspension to your riding style and terrain.

A good quality fork shock absorber can make a significant difference in your ride quality and overall performance on the trails.
ecom-yaxa2-product.textCard2_ycdifaa9x7d_html:
Choosing the right saddle for your mountain bike is essential for a comfortable and enjoyable ride.

Saddles come in different shapes and sizes, with varying levels of padding and support. It's important to choose a saddle that fits your body shape and riding style. A saddle that is too narrow or too wide can cause discomfort, while a saddle that is too soft or too firm can also be uncomfortable.

Here we, offer saddle demos or rental programs, which allow you to try out different saddles before making a purchase. When trying out a saddle, make sure to take it on a long ride to test its comfort and support over time.
ecom-yaxa2-product.textCard3_ycdifaa9x7d_html:
The car is equipped with spiked tires to create traction on different types of terrain. 

Wear-resistant and explosion-proof tire with wide tread groove. All create the perfect durability for Mountain bikes
ecom-yaxa2-product.itemtitle0_gfmik12000n_html: Could you put 27.5" tires on the Salvo?
ecom-yaxa2-product.itemtitle1_gfmik12000n_html: What are the threaded tabs for on the headtube?
ecom-yaxa2-product.itemtitle2_gfmik12000n_html: Is the bike assembled when ordered?
ecom-yaxa2-product.textcontent_x7hhsgrz9tl_html: Great question! We're only able to offer information regarding original replacement parts. For upgrades and alterations, we recommend reaching out to a local bike shop for further assistance. Thanks for your question!
ecom-yaxa2-product.textcontent_wx5wgjgbiob_html: Great question! All of the colorways for this model are equipped with cable guides. You're right, though, the lighting in the pictures hides some of the guides on the blue and silver. Thanks so much for bringing this to our attention!
ecom-yaxa2-product.textcontent_7te15jvyy5_html: Bikes arrive about 90% assembled. You will need to attach the pedals, seat, handlebars, and front wheel. We also recommend checking the brakes before your first ride, as these may have shifted during shipping. Thanks for your question!
ecom-yaxa2-product.textcontent_9g0lqi0cw7c_html: It’s not as heavy as it looks. I would say the tires being bigger is where the weight is. But the frame is light. I actually bought this for my 10yr old. And he absolutely loves it. Big boy 10yr old. 5’ 8” 170lbs
ecom-yaxa2-product.textcontent_wex7myym9kg_html:
That's a great question that we're asked a lot. And, at this time I don't have that information available. The good news is our Product team is working on this and hope to have weight limits available for all bikes soon. I know this doesn't help you very much now when you're searching for that perfect bike – and I apologize!

There are many factors that impact how much weight a bicycle can withstand – such as the type of riding, road conditions, how the weight of the rider and cargo is distributed, tire inflation, and proper assembly and maintenance. Our internal bike experts are taking all these things into consideration to determine weight capacities for our bikes. 

 Thanks for reaching out!

onboarding.product_description: Esta área se utiliza para describir los detalles de su producto. Informe a los clientes sobre el aspecto, la sensación y el estilo de su producto. Agregue detalles sobre el color, los materiales utilizados, el tamaño y el lugar donde se fabricó.
onboarding.title: El nombre de tu colección
onboarding.blog_excerpt: Tu tienda aún no ha publicado ninguna publicación de blog. Un blog se puede utilizar para hablar sobre lanzamientos de nuevos productos, consejos u otras noticias que desee compartir con sus clientes. Puede consultar el blog de comercio electrónico de Shopify para obtener inspiración y consejos para su propia tienda y blog.
onboarding.no_content: Esta sección actualmente no incluye ningún contenido. Agrega contenido a esta sección usando la barra lateral.

shipping_errors.shipping_method_not_available: Tu carrito se ha actualizado y los artículos que agregaste no pueden enviarse a tu dirección. No contamos con cobertura para el servicio de armado, elimina este artículo para completar tu pedido.
